title: SOC 2
description: Built with SOC 2 compliance in mind, ensuring strong controls for data security, availability, and privacy.

title: HIPAA Compliance
description: Designed with HIPAA compliance in mind, providing safeguards for sensitive health information.

title: GDPR Compliance
description: Designed to align with GDPR requirements, responsible handling & protection of personal data.

title: PCI DSS Compliance
description: Implements secure handling of cardholder data and adheres to the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) to protect financial transactions.

title: ISO 27001
description: Follows ISO 27001 standards for information security management, ensuring a systematic approach to managing sensitive company information.
